LanguageData.IIUseCurrentRoomForInfectionChance: Use current room for infection chance
LanguageData.IIUseCurrentRoomForInfectionChanceDes: Base game uses room cleanliness at tend time to adjust infection chance. This option makes the game to consider the current room instead.
LanguageData.IIInfectionChanceColorY: Chance of infection with yellow warning
LanguageData.IIInfectionChanceColorYDes: Displayed in yellow when greater than this value (default value 0%)
LanguageData.IIInfectionChanceColorR: Chance of infection with red warning
LanguageData.IIInfectionChanceColorRDes: Displayed in red when greater than this value (default value 10%)
LanguageData.IISeverityAtImmunityYDes: ☠ appears when the severity at immunity is greater than this value (default value 80%)
LanguageData.IISeverityAtImmunityRDes: ☠ turning red when the severity at immunity is greater than this value (default value 100%)
